definition: to refresh and clear the mind (idiom)/invigorating/bracing
to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid
to wake up/to be awake/to become aware/to sober up/to come to

sentences.english: I need my coffee to wake up my brain.
sentences.chinese: 清晨，咖啡可以提神醒脑。

sentences.english: Yeah. Cold milk wakes me up.
sentences.chinese: 没错，冰牛奶能使我提神醒脑。

sentences.english: I am so hot and this cool water is very refreshing.
sentences.chinese: 我好热，这些冰凉的水大有提神醒脑之效。

sentences.english: Fresh up with Seven-up, taste that beats the other cold.
sentences.chinese: 君饮七喜，提神醒脑，其它冷饮无法比拟的口味。

definition: to freshen up/to be cautious or vigilant/to watch out/stimulant to enhance mental performance/stay-awake drug/agrypnotic
to calm (soothe) the nerves/to relieve uneasiness of body and mind
to nourish one's skin/to maintain a youthful appearance
to moisten the lungs/to make expectoration easy (medicine)
essential balm containing menthol, eucalyptus oil etc, used as a mosquito repellant
